projects.title: An budget Application
projects.description: Eat'n-Split is a easy to use budget application designed to streamline shared expenses among friends, offering features like expense tracking, effortless bill splitting, and friend profiles. With its user-friendly interface and privacy measures, it simplifies financial transparency and promotes harmonious relationships, making it easier than ever to keep track of who owes what and share expenses seamlessly.

projects.title: Agritech Website
projects.description: This platform serves as a dynamic hub for the agritech startup, bridging the gap between technology and agriculture. Join us to explore the transformative impact of modern agricultural practices on Indian farming, connecting with farmers and raising awareness about the positive changes sweeping through the industry.
